label: Education
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
  berufab11 == 1 ~ 8,
  berufab10 == 1 ~ 7,
  berufab9 == 1 | berufab8 == 1 | berufab7 == 1 | berufab6 == 1 ~ 6,
  berufab4 == 1 ~ 4,
  berufab5 == 1 | berufab2 == 1 |schulab_corr %in% c(7:9) ~ 3,
  schulab_corr %in% c(3:6) ~ 2,
  schulab_corr == 1 ~ 1,
  berufab1 == 1 |berufab3 == 1 |berufab12 == 1 |schulab_corr %in% c(10,999,888) ~ 9
)

label: Employment
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
  erwerb == 1 ~ 1,
  erwerb %in% c(2,3,4,6) ~ 2,
  erwerb %in% c(5,10) ~ 5,
  erwerb %in% c(7,8) ~ 6,
  erwerb %in% c(9,999,888) ~ 7,
  erwerb == 11 & situation %in% c(1,2) ~ 6,
  erwerb == 11 & situation == 3 ~ 4,
  erwerb == 11 & situation == 4 ~ 5,
  erwerb == 11 & situation %in% c(5,7,999, 888) ~ 7,
  erwerb == 11 & situation == 6 ~ 3,
)

label: Immigration background
Mlstr_harmo::comment: Persons are considered to have an immigration background if they were born abroad or do not hold German citizenship. Only those born in Germany and with German citizenship are classified as having no immigration background.

label: Cumulative lifetime tobacco exposure  [pack years]
Amount of daily tobacco smoked [g/day]
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
ifelse(
  is.na(rauch_zigzahl) & is.na(rauch_pipezahl), 
  NA,
  (ifelse(is.na(rauch_zigzahl) | is.na(rauch_zigperiod), 0, 
          rauch_zigzahl / ifelse(rauch_zigperiod == 1, 1, 
                                 ifelse(rauch_zigperiod == 2, 7, 30)) * 1)) +
  (ifelse(is.na(rauch_pipezahl) | is.na(rauch_pipeperiod), 0, 
          rauch_pipezahl / ifelse(rauch_pipeperiod == 1, 1, 
                                  ifelse(rauch_pipeperiod == 2, 7, 30)) * 5))
)

label: Age at time of quitting smoking [years]
Menopause status
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
    wechseljahre == 1 ~ 2,
    wechseljahre == 2 | zykaus_1 == 1 ~ 1,
    wechseljahre == 3 | zyk_rgm == 1 ~ 0,
    zykaus_2 == 1 | zykaus_3 == 1 ~ 3
  )

label: Use of contraceptive pills or injections [years]
Number of live births given [Nr. of birth]
Age at the first given birth [years]
Total cholesterol measured from blood samples [mmol/L]
LDL cholesterol measured from blood samples [mmol/L]
HDL cholesterol measured from blood samples [mmol/L]
History of diabetes
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
  dataset$diab_diagnose_m ==1 | dataset$diab_diagnose_f %in% c(1:3) ~ 1,
  dataset$diab_diagnose_m ==2 | dataset$diab_diagnose_f == 4 ~ 0,
  TRUE ~ NA_integer_
)

label: History of cardiovascular disease
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
  hi_diagnose == 1| hkg_diagnose == 1| hschw_diagnose == 1| schlag_diagnose == 1| hrhyt_diagnose == 1 ~ 1,
  hi_diagnose == 2| hkg_diagnose == 2| hschw_diagnose == 2| schlag_diagnose == 2| hrhyt_diagnose == 2 ~ 0,
  TRUE ~ NA_integer_
)
